column4: have you checked the list of stored wireless networks to see if there are any conflicting entries named "linksys" ?
yea, i'v cleaned the list out, where should i look though
the places I'd check are the "Edit wireless networks..." dialog on the network manager (right-click)
I'd also look in gconf-editor to see if there's stuff hanging out there, but I don't have 9.04, and things move around a lot between versions.
